mapper.select: select st.studentid,st.student_name,st.sex,st.nation,st.birthday, st.native_place,st.marital_status,st.phone, from student st left join score sc on sc.studentid = st.studentid left join course co on co.courseid = sc.courseid

select st.studentid,st.student_name,st.college,st.native_place, sc.score,sh.appraisal_score,de.appraisal_score from student st left join score sc on sc.studentid = st.studentid left join course co on co.courseid = sc.courseid left join school_evaluation sh on sh.studentid = st.studentid left join dept_evaluation de on de.studentid = st.studentid order by st.studentid desc
